briefTitle: Loteprednol Etabonate in an Ophthalmic Base vs Vehicle for the Treatment of Inflammation Following Cataract Surgery
officialTitle: Safety and Efficacy of Loteprednol Etabonate in an Ophthalmic Base vs Vehicle for the Treatment of Inflammation Following Cataract Surgery
summary: Evaluation of the clinical safety and efficacy of loteprednol etabonate in an ophthalmic base, when compared to vehicle for the treatment of inflammation following cataract surgery.
